# VEHICLE::SET_REDUCED_SUSPENSION_FORCE

## Summary
Set reduced suspension force, so users can "stance" cars

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** reduceSuspensionForce

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Lowers the vehicle's stance. Only works for vehicles that have strAdvancedFlags 0x8000 and 0x4000000 set.

## Hashes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Do not change -->
|Version|Hash              |
|-------|------------------|
|2824   |0xCE2ADF354D3F97AE|
|2802   |0x8F6032D7CEB013A5|
